shareMenu.shareDescription: This visualisation tool, created by Eurostat, displays electricity and natural gas prices in the EU and other European countries with a great level of detail. Users can interact with the data and customise the display in many different ways.

electricity.title: Electricity Prices
electricity.description: Interactive visualization of electricity prices across EU countries.

gas.title: Gas Prices
gas.description: Interactive visualization of natural gas prices across EU countries.

welcome.title: Welcome to Energy Visualization
welcome.content: This tool helps you explore and understand energy prices across the EU.

cards.title: Visualization Tools
cards.content: Here you'll find different tools to explore energy data. Each card represents a different visualization option.

actions.title: Tool Actions
actions.content: You can customize the visualization settings or directly access the tool using these buttons.

share.title: Share Your Findings
share.content: Share interesting insights with others through various social media platforms.

language.title: Language Options
language.content: Change the interface language to your preferred option.

home.title: Eurostat Homepage
home.content: Return to the Eurostat main website at any time.
